overview: The very first shot of this film will make you want to order pizza. Just looking at Martino Paiva will have your pants on the floor and your phone in hand placing your order. From the moment he walks in on his first customers in their tight, white boxer-briefs to the moment the last wad is shot, you will wonder where to order from so you can relive this scene in the comfort of your own home. Alexander Pictures has done it again. He’s crossed the unbelievable hotness of big-dicked studs with the almost imaginable fucking of the pizza boy in a way that will make you mess your drawers. Just sit back and enjoy a slice of pie made as only Alexander could.
title: Black Topped Pizza Boy
